trans-unit.source: Provides multi-targeting for Windows Workflow Designer hosts.
trans-unit.target: Fornece vários destinos para os hosts do Designer de Fluxo de Trabalho do Windows.

trans-unit.source: *Multi-targeting* is the ability to find the right version of the loaded assembly that corresponds to the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] version of the current workflow project in [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: *Multiplataforma* é a capacidade de localizar a versão correta do assembly carregado que corresponde ao destino [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] versão do projeto atual do fluxo de trabalho em [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented and used internally by [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components to resolve [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies in a multi-targeting aware fashion within the [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] hosting application.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface é implementada e usado internamente pelo [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] componentes do designer para resolver [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies de vários destinos com reconhecimento de forma dentro de [!INCLUDE[vs2010](~/includes/vs2010-md.md)] hospedando o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] designer components use the implementation of this interface only when additional assemblies need to be loaded dynamically into the editing `AppDomain`.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] componentes designer usam a implementação dessa interface somente quando assemblies adicionais precisam ser carregados dinamicamente para a edição `AppDomain`.

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o assembly carregado no momento, considerando o nome do assembly.

trans-unit.source: The currently loaded assembly given the assembly name.
trans-unit.target: O assembly carregado no momento, considerando o nome do assembly.

trans-unit.source: The type to get the runtime type of.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para o qual obter o tipo de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: Gets the runtime type that corresponds to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de tempo de execução que corresponde ao tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The runtime type that corresponds to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de tempo de execução que corresponde ao tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type is supported.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se há suporte para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified type is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se houver suporte para o tipo especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
